en: we (first person plural inclusive subject pronoun)
our, inclusive (first person inclusive plural possessive adjective modifying any class noun after preposition or a movement verb)
ours, inclusive (first person plural inclusive possessive pronoun referring back to class 2 nouns)
our, inclusive (first person plural inclusive possessive adjective modifying class 2 nouns)
ours, inclusive (first person plural inclusive emphatic possessive adjective modifying class 2 nouns)

ngiemboon: Epɔ́b pʉ̀a ně ndáʼ ńtó, epégè gwɔ́ pɔ́ nzɔ̌?
en: Their people have since come, where are ours then?

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n zɛté lezíŋ múɔ, á ná pɔ́ péle lezíŋ.
en: I asked the child's name, he only gave the first name.

ngiemboon: Líe mekúnɔ̀ɔn pembòŋo, mèŋ n ge jú.
en: Look at the best pigs, I will buy.
